articles.description: Gold prices have in just 6 months have gone down by Rs. 10000 per 10 gm since touccord highs in Rs. 56200 per 10 gm and now are hovering near Rs. 46000 mark on the MCX in the future market. In the spot market, they are trading at Rs. 46690 per 10gm.
